1973 was MaharishiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s year of action fort he world plan to bring the knowledge of his science of creative intelligence (SCI) to every individual on earth. During this year, Maharishi spoke to the legislators and governors throughout the U.S.
This DVD portrays MaharishiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s meetings with the Governors and Legislatures of Illinois and Michigan.
Maharishi congratulates the Illinois state legislature for having passed a resolution supporting his Transcendental Meditation program and SCI. In a longer talk to the Michigan legislature, Maharishi describes his philosophy of government in detail and takes questions from the legislators.
